title: Knife, ca. 1800–1900
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Leaf-shaped brass blade, brass ferrule. Pistol-shaped porcelain handle. Painted floral design in yellow, brown, blue, red and gold on a white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1800–1900.
ca. 1800–1900. porcelain, brass. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-144.
